General.Name: Providence Resources P.l.c
General.Description: Barryroe Offshore Energy plc operates as an oil and gas exploration company in Ireland. Its principal project is the Barryroe project located in the North Celtic Sea Basin. The company was formerly known as Providence Resources P.l.c. and changed its name to Barryroe Offshore Energy plc in September 2022. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
General.Address: Paramount Court, Dublin, Ireland, D18 R9C7
